name: TecSinapse
description: Tecsinapse's main focus is to create products that will meet your business including infrastructure, implementation consulting and training, integration with legacy software, customization or upgrades. The firm works on a different model they call +SaaS (Software as a Service Plus) that provides both the use of the online platform with the product(s) licensed as an unlimited advice and continuous evolution of the solution.

locations.address: Av. Dr. Chucri Zaidan, 940 – 16º andar - Market Place Tower II
R. Quinze de Novembro, 2550 - Sala 302 Jardim dos Estados
